trans-unit.source: Sends a message to a Dummy control.

seg-source.mrk: Sends a message to a Dummy control.

target.mrk: Sends a message to a Dummy control.

trans-unit.source: The control identifier (controlID) as returned by GUICtrlCreateDummy()

seg-source.mrk: The control identifier (controlID) as returned by GUICtrlCreateDummy()

target.mrk: The control identifier (controlID) as returned by GUICtrlCreateDummy()

trans-unit.source: [optional] value that can be retrieved later on by GUICtrlRead()

seg-source.mrk: value that can be retrieved later on by GUICtrlRead()

target.mrk: value that can be retrieved later on by GUICtrlRead()

trans-unit.source: When this function is called a notification that can be handled through the message loop or with a GUICtrlSetOnEvent() function is generated (as if the control had been "clicked" on).

seg-source.mrk: When this function is called a notification that can be handled through the message loop or with a GUICtrlSetOnEvent() function is generated (as if the control had been "clicked" on).

target.mrk: When this function is called a notification that can be handled through the message loop or with a GUICtrlSetOnEvent() function is generated (as if the control had been "clicked" on).

trans-unit.source: Note that the function will not action the dummy control if the GUI in which it was created is hidden, as by design none of the controls on such a GUI can be actioned.

seg-source.mrk: Note that the function will not action the dummy control if the GUI in which it was created is hidden, as by design none of the controls on such a GUI can be actioned.

target.mrk: Note that the function will not action the dummy control if the GUI in which it was created is hidden, as by design none of the controls on such a GUI can be actioned.

trans-unit.source: Set the option to use GUIOnEventMode.

trans-unit.source: Set an event to call the 'OnExit' function.

trans-unit.source: Send a message to the dummy control that the close button was selected, which will then proceed to call the function 'OnExit'.
